Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are green and efficient power generation devices, which can efficiently utilize the abundant low concentration coal mine methane (LC-CMM), and play an important role in energy saving and emission reduction.
Titulo: Applying high efficiency internal reforming catalyst for direct low concentration coal mine methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, there are still challenges need to be addressed, such as low conversion efficiency and deposit carbon.
Titulo: Applying high efficiency internal reforming catalyst for direct low concentration coal mine methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, a Sr 2 Fe 1.4 Ni 0.1 Mo 0.5 O 6-delta -Gd
Titulo: Applying high efficiency internal reforming catalyst for direct low concentration coal mine methane solid oxide fuel cells
Applying high efficiency internal reforming catalyst for direct low concentration coal mine methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ce 0.9 O 2-delta (SFNM-GDC) internal reforming catalyst is prepared, generating abundant oxygen vacancies with in situ precipitates Fe-Ni alloys in the reducing atmosphere, leading to improved methane reforming efficiency and carbon deposition resistance.
Titulo: Applying high efficiency internal reforming catalyst for direct low concentration coal mine methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that the cell exhibits excellent electrochemical performance with the internal reforming catalyst, with the maximum power density (P max ) of 1212 mW cm -2 and 980 mW cm -2 at 800 degrees C with H 2 and LC-CMM, respectively, corresponding to polarization impedances of 0.16 Omega cm 2 and 0.47 Omega cm 2 .
Titulo: Applying high efficiency internal reforming catalyst for direct low concentration coal mine methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: More importantly, the single cell combining SFNM-GDC reformed layer can maintain stable performance for 100 h at 700 degrees C under the atmosphere of LC-CMM.
Titulo: Applying high efficiency internal reforming catalyst for direct low concentration coal mine methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results highlight that the reformed layer enhances CH 4 reforming, optimizes electrochemistry and increases resistance to carbon deposition.
Titulo: Applying high efficiency internal reforming catalyst for direct low concentration coal mine methane solid oxide fuel cells
